page.title: 13THE NORTH NORFOLK HARRIERS
page.content: Nicholas tells us the North Norfolk Harriers meet every Tuesday and Saturday from October to March unless the ground is too hard.The opening Meet is held on Aldborough Green and meets twice a year at Hanworth Hall.There are two masters,Mrs Gurney from Northrepps and Mr Jorden from Coltishall_a secretary,who collects the'caps'or fees a huntsman and two whippers in.These wear dark green coats with brass buttons.The hounds are smaller than fox hounds_white with tan markings.They are counted in couples_about 13 couples for a days hunting.The hunts moves at 11am with permission from farmers to go over their land.Hares run in circles so the harriers do not go far from the meet- ing place.Before you leave the hunt you say 'good-night'(never good bye).
